name: ウィルス
summary: Main character is separated from his older brother and sister due to parents' divorce. A few years later sister asks him to check on brother who does not come to contact. Brother is found dead with a tattoo all over his body. Protagonist starts his own investigation with the help of some friends.
info:
• 别名: Virus
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2001/12/07
  • 开发: Celt
